title: Patrick McLoughlin – 2013 Speech on Rail Privatisation
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the Secretary of State for Transport, Patrick McLoughlin, on rail privatisation. The speech was made on 12th November 2013 at the European Rail Congress.
